DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this Investigation is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of long-term treatment with Xalacom in medical practice. Also, occurrence of unknown and known adverse drug reactions (ADRs) in subjects treated with Xalacom will be monitored during the survey period, and whether an additional treatment outcome investigation and/or a post-marketing clinical study is required in the future will be determined.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Use Of Xalacom In Patients Glaucoma Or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: All the patients whom an investigator prescribes the first Xalacom® should be registered consecutively until the number of subjects reaches target number in order to extract patients enrolled into the investigation at random.
DOC.criteria: Patients need to be administered Xalacom® in order to be enrolled in the surveillance. Patients not administered Xalacom®.
DOC.keyword: Xalacom Regulatory post marketing commitment plan safety
